title.rendered: Paarl vs Joburg, South Africa T20 League 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Paarl: Jason Roy, Jos Buttler (wk), Wihan Lubbe, Eoin Morgan, David Miller (c), Dane Vilas, Ferisco Adams, Bjorn Fortuin, Ramon Simmonds, Codi Yusuf, Tabraiz Shamsi

Joburg: Reeza Hendricks, Janneman Malan, Faf du Plessis (c), Kyle Verreynne (wk), Lewis Gregory, Donavon Ferreira, Romario Shepherd, George Garton, Alzarri Joseph, Malusi Siboto, Aaron Phangiso

Pitch Report

Venue: Boland Park, Paarl

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 154

2nd innings average score: 150

Wickets per innings: 5

Type: Balanced

Weather: Slightly cloudy but no rain forecast during the game

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

In the last 3 games, the spinners accounted for 41% of the wickets. The batters found it difficult to get going in the middle overs.

Ferisco Adams has impressive numbers at Paarl. He has scored 209 runs at 23 and taken 22 wickets (the most at the venue).

Tabraiz Shamsi too has had a good time here, scalping 18 wickets in 12 games and maintaining an economy of 7.

With the bat, Janneman Malan has good numbers at the venue. He averages 36 in 4 games and has a top score of 74*.

Jos Buttler and Reeza Hendricks have appeared in the Ultimate Team in their last 5 games.

Faf du Plessis has been blowing hot and cold in the format lately. In his last 5 innings, he has 3 single-digit scores and 2 thirties.

While Paarl are bolstered with batting firepower, Joburg have as many as 7 bowling options.
